label.name: info.tab.container
label.label: ORCF development tree

ORCF - The Open RollerCoaster Factory - is a simulation game similar to the RollerCoaster Tycoon series, but not focussing on economic strategies. It is more for people who want to create a good-looking theme park.
It is very easy to create and use custom scenery and rides because it's simply wanted. You can download content from http://insert-some-link-here.org/orcf/
Philip Rebohle ("ThunderGod") - Initiator, Programming Moritz Irgendwas ("BlackMambaFan") - Programming
THANK YOU!
